abstract: Marissa Mayer, one of the top executives at Google, will be the next C.E.O. of Yahoo, making her one of the most prominent women in Silicon Valley and corporate America.
snippet: Marissa Mayer, one of the top executives at Google, will be the next C.E.O. of Yahoo, making her one of the most prominent women in Silicon Valley and corporate America.
lead_paragraph: 9:06 p.m. | Updated Marissa Mayer, one of the top executives at Google, will be the next chief of Yahoo, making her one of the most prominent women in Silicon Valley and corporate America.

headline.main: A Yahoo Search Calls Up a Chief From Google
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Search Calls Up Chief From Google

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Evelyn M. Rusli
